title: Dragon Ball
description: Bulma is a girl in search of the mystical dragonballs that when brought together grant any wish. In her search she bumps into the owner of one of these balls, a strange boy named Goku. The two then set off together, Bulma in search of the dragonballs and Goku on a quest to become stronger.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
